original_title: “Fuel companies advised to maintain 50% stocks during festive season”, says State Minister D.V. Chanaka
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – State Minister of Power and Electricity D.V. Chanaka says that fuel companies have been advised to maintain stocks during the festive season, to provide uninterrupted fuel to the public.
The State Minister has given these instructions to CEYPETCO, Lanka IOC, and SINOPEC.
Accordingly, the State Minister has advised them to maintain 50% stocks to ensure continuous fuel supply.
“Fuel companies advised to maintain 50% stocks during festive season”, says State Minister D.V. Chanaka
